Should I maybe follow up in a week if I haven't heard anything from you, just to touch base? I ask you to follow up on the questions that we asked. Oh, absolutely. Okay. Yeah. Yeah. Follow up on that. And then you have Beverly's contact. You can send it to her. I do. And then she'll let you know. Perfect. I will follow up once I have those answers, and then we can take it from there. Great. Thank you. Thank you. Thanks for your time. Thanks, everyone. Okay. Have a great day. You too. Bye-bye. Bye, Jim.
